name: Pitekunsaurus
overview: Pitekunsaurus is a genus of titanosaurian sauropod dinosaur from the Late Cretaceous Anacleto Formation of Neuqu√©n, Argentina. It was described by L. Filippi and A. Garrido in 2008.
